attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I opened this app hoping to be able to see news from trump. When i opened the app my phone immediately got a virus. I got an email from the Trump campaign with the subject line calling me the n word. He also texted my elderly mother asking her for “booty pics”.

attributes.title: Trump is a Orange booty hole 😭👺😒🤤🥴😒😌✌🏽
attributes.review: This app is booty. Make America great again? What a joke. America was great before Trump was elected president. I think this whole ban wave thingy would be a better effort to make America “great again”. I am not a Trump supporter. Trump is a orange peel rotting away in the trash can. This app goes against probably more than half of humanity. Ban this app.

attributes.title: fix app or might as well delete it
attributes.review: Look i actually downloaded the app and it made my phone crash. i have no type of social media but yet it made my phone crash. if i could leave a 0 start i would.

attributes.title: SPAM
attributes.review: The app kept making my phone crash and was using false propaganda to advertise the campaign. Apart from that, the slander use in the app was also excessive and they didn’t show actual reasons, evidence, or facts to support Trump’s campaign. There was only blackmail against Biden. It’s truly an unreliable app.

attributes.title: Cheeto vibes and hot Cheeto!!!😔🤬🤬
attributes.review: I’m so sick of president trump taking away my hot Cheetos! I own the coco Chanel company👿👿 so he texts me.. right? And he tells me that legally I have to give him all my hot Cheetos because he’s related to them. But i have my collection and he can’t take it away! I don’t like this app too!! It very very bad quality🤮🤮🤢

attributes.title: Glitches and doesn’t work properly
attributes.review: I was got  the app and when I was never able to actually open as soon as I taped on it I glitched out and kicked me out of it and have not been able to open it since

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: This app kept sending me notifications, and wouldn’t stop even when I tries to change it in settings. Terrible platform, with false information. Opossums love garbage, but this was so much worse than garbage that me and Coon ✨deleted it✨ and left a ✨scathing review✨

attributes.title: absolutely not.
attributes.review: it wouldn’t let me open the app, it wouldn’t even let me write a review and it gave me 3 viruses. i’m also getting spam from the dumb app. do NOT get it. my mother got it and it hacked her phone and stole $200 from her credit card. this is OUTRAGEOUS. you should be lucky i’m not suing.

attributes.title: So terrible 😫😭
attributes.review: So it took a a whole week to download and it also is sooo glitchy and it also took my information and it hacked my personal social media and when I tried to use it told me to tell them my email password so bad don’t download it 😔😭😤

attributes.title: No 💗💕💖
attributes.review:
you tried to be creative ❤️✨ don’t ever try again 💞✨💗🧚🏽 
This app is absolutely terrible but I mean how can I expect great things from a sexist, racist, homophobic, islamophobic cheeto puff. You will never be able to silence us, we will always rise. Hope the bad reviews don’t get to you, bunker baby. 
xoxo,
gen z
